import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {Col,Row, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating'; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId); console.log() return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductScreen
